00015 potentiallist = ['EMT']#,'GPAW']
00016 
00017 def runTest(test,potential,el,verbose=True):
00018     testname = test[len(testdirectory):-3]
00019     if verbose:
00020         print "=================================================="
00021         print "Running %s with %s for %s" % ( testname, potential, el)
00022     outputfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.out'
00023     outputfilepath = outputdirectory + outputfilename
00024     resultfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.xml'
00025     resultfilepath = resultsdirectory + resultfilename
00026     if verbose:
00027         print 
00028         print "File output... "
00029     start = time.time()
00030     if verbose:
00031         print "EXECUTING: "
00032         print 'python ' + test + ' ' + potential + ' ' + el + ' -w ' + '| tee ' + outputfilepath
00033     outflag = os.system('python ' + test + ' ' + potential + ' ' + el + ' -w ' + '| tee ' + outputfilepath)
00034     if outflag:
00035         os.system('rm ' + outputfilepath)
00036         print "Exception Occured"
00037         return -1
00038     end = time.time()
00039     if verbose:
00040         print 
00041         print "Test completed successfully in %f seconds" % (end-start)
00042         print "Results stored in %s" % resultfilename
00043     return 0 
00044 
00045 def runTests(runAll = False):
00046     pipelinestart = time.time()
00047     if runAll:
00048         print "Running a full pipeline, all tests"
00049     lstTests = glob.glob(testdirectory + '*.py')
00050     lstTests.remove(testdirectory + 'BaseTest.py')
00051     lstTests.remove(testdirectory + 'NullTest.py')
00052     print lstTests
00053     print "Running pipeline... "
00054     print "There are a total of %d Tests" % (len(lstTests))
00055     for test in lstTests:
00056         testname = test[len(testdirectory):-3]
00057         for potential in potentiallist:
00058             for el in emtfcclist:
00059                 if runAll:
00060                     runTest(test,potential,el)
00061                 else:
00062                     resultfilename = testname + '.' + potential + '.' + el + '.xml'
00063                     resultfilepath = resultsdirectory + resultfilename
00064                     try:
00065                         fob = open(resultfilepath)
00066                         print "Test configuation for %s already exists..." % resultfilename
00067                     except IOError:
00068                         runTest(test,potential,el)  
00069     pipelinestop = time.time()
00070     
00071     print "Pipeline update finished, took %f seconds " % (pipelinestop-pipelinestart)              
00072             
00073             
00074 if __name__ == '__main__':
00075     runAllFlag = False
00076     for opt in sys.argv:
00077         if opt == '--full':
00078             runAllFlag = True
00079     runTests(runAll = runAllFlag)
